author: Travis La Marr

changelog.release_notes:
• Fixed a crashing bug on notification screen
 • Added Heart Rate monitoring on supported devices (Pebble 2)

- Tweaked design
- Added comma display on step count
- Fixed some bugs
- Optimized slightly for better battery life
- Don't publish app updates before coffee. ☕️
- Fixed a bug causing the step count display to max out at 9999. 🏃💨

- Fixed a bug causing inactivity alerts to trigger while sleeping 😴... when you're supposed to be inactive. 😂 (Sorry if that woke you up. 😳)
- Tweaked inactivity vibration pattern a little. 🐝🐝
- Lowered the inactivity threshold. It was a little overzealous 💪 (Send feedback on it!)
- Punch it 👊 Chewie! (Improved launch time.) 🚀
- There may be an outside chance your settings may be reset. ...Hopefully not though. I'm sorry if that happens. 😰
- 100% More emoji's in changelogs. 😆

• Added a new step goal option, "Yesterday". Beat the number of steps you took yesterday.
• Fixes a crash on the award dialog.
• Fixed a bug where streak count would never reset back to zero.

• Better handling for when notifications come in and an alert is showing.
• New vibration patterns on goal & inactivity alerts.

• Added 8 Color Themes
• Added an option to display the time
• Added an alternate round UI on the Pebble Time
• Fixed some bugs

Major update.

-Added Bonus Goals, because you're an over achiever.
-Added Streak Counts
-Added Encouragement to move around a bit if you've been inactive for a while.
-More slothy.
-Fixed some bugs, general improvements.
-Added new bugs.

description:
Step Goal lets you set a daily step goal, and tracks your progress throughout the day towards your goal. It will buzz your wrist when you reach the goal you've set. It also features an optional periodic reminder if you haven't been very active to move around some.


Features:
• Set a daily step goal of 2k, 4k, 6k, 8k, 10k, 15k, or 20k Steps
• Choose to enable a bonus goal you can reach, you over achiever.
• Counts your current streak, if you want.
• Motivates you if you've been inactive for a while to get up and move around some. (This feature is beta.)
• 8 Color Themes
• Displays the time (It's almost like a watch!)
• Circles
• Sloths

latest_release.release_notes:
• Fixed a crashing bug on notification screen
 • Added Heart Rate monitoring on supported devices (Pebble 2)

title: Step Goal
